story:
SEE BELOW FOR MORE PERKS!!!

 

Our Story

He goes by many names......Dr. Funkenstein, Mr Wiggles the Worm, Lollipop Man. No matter what you call him his work is inescapable. George Clinton and Parliament Funkadelic are pioneers of funk music, whose sound is the  DNA of modern Hip-Hop and Soul. From "I Wanna Testify", "One Nation Under A Groove", and "Mothership Connection" though "Flashlight", "Atomic Dog", and "Paint The White House Black", P-Funk has been on the front lines of progressive creativity and has forged a sound and a style that has turned heads and tore up stages for over 5 decades! But the flight of the Mothership has not been without turbulence. Countless acts of copyright fraud, theft, and intellectual injustice have and still continue to attempt to derail the funk from fulfilling its mission. As George fights daily for the funk, this campaign acts as an opportunity for us to unite and return it to its rightful owners.

 

The Impact

As George continues to battle for the rights to his own songs we are looking to expand our self-sufficient nature, as to not need the powers that be: record labels, lawyers, and publishers. By expanding our own studio and creating a better environment for the housing of George's classic material past and present, we are creating an opportunity for this and future generations of funkateers to be able to continue to spread the message that "Everything Is On The One!" and we are "One Nation Under A Groove". As we put a stop to corrupt figures who continue to claim rights and ownership of the funk from the shadows, we are creating an environment that enables the funk to live on forever.

 

What We Need & What You Get

With this campaign we are looking to raise $50,000 for the restoration and preservation of original recordings, as well as urgent repairs and upgrades to the Parliament-Funkadelic family recording studio.

-Tape Machine Repair
-Neve Mixing Console Repair
-Tape Archive Construction
-Studio A Live Room Construction
-Studio B Room Construction
-Creation Of Two Pre-Production Rooms
-Sound Proofing
-Roof Repair
-Studio Wiring
-Recording Software and Hardware
-Microphones

In exchange for contributions, we are offering a number of exclusive and awesome perks, which include everything from autographed cd's and gear, to your own personal P-Funk concert with your favorite tracks as the setlist.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word of this campaign to funkers everywhere on Facebook, Twitter, and everywhere else you can think of. Together we can keep the funk coming for generations to come!!

 

 

ADDITIONAL PERKS

IF INTERESTED LEAVE A COMMENT OR PRIVATE MESSAGE AND WE WILL CONTACT YOU

 

 

$75

Shout Out in credits

Receive a shout out in the credits of upcoming P-Funk projects.

 

$200

Autographed T-Shirt

Receive a T-Shirt autographed by George and some of the other band members.

 

$300

Call or voicemail from George

Get a call from George and shoot the breeze with a musical legend and funk icon or have George record a drop or voicemail message for you.

 

$2500

Painting sesh w GC and Overton

Have a painting session with George and famed P-Funk visual artist Overton Lloyd; responsible for much of P-Funk's iconic imagery for several decades.
Travel and lodging not included.

 

$5000

Passes to all p-funk gigs 1yr

Receive 2 passes to all P-Funk shows  for 1 year!

 

$10,000

George Clinton Collab Pack

Come to What Studio and make a song with George Clinton. The session will be videotaped and there will be a lunch with a Q&A. You will leave the studio with your song, the DVD of your session, and an Uncle Jam Packet with cd's t-shirts etc...
Travel and lodging not included

 

$25000

Private Concert w your setlist

Receive an invite to a private concert at "The Moon" club in Tallahassee for you and 100 of your guests with your own playlist being played!! Travel and lodging not included.

story:
Our Story

We're Christian rappers and have been making music for 10 years now. All we've ever wanted was the opportunity to get signed to a record label. We're now striving to get signed to Clear Sight Music, a label owned by our biggest inspiration, FLAME. Please, out of the kindness of your heart, allow us to get him to our church to open up and perform with him. He knows of us already, and it would be a great opportunity to meet and perform with him!! Thanks, and God bless!

 

The Impact

We're just trying to impact the world with our lyrics.

 

What We Need

We need $4,000 to get FLAME, V.Rose, and Young Noah (2 artists he's signed) to our church. IF we do not reach our goal, don't worry, we'll be saving it and continuing to pursue this dream.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our website, Facebook, Twitter, and Youtube!!

www.metanoiz.com

www.facebook.com/metanoiz

www.twitter.com (@Metanoiz)

www.youtube.com/metanoiz

story:
Hi everybody! My name is Vito Petroccitto and I'm trying to bring my first ever solo CD project to completion. I started working on it about a year ago. I've been trying to fund the project on my own but finally realized that it is way too much for me to handle.

So I've decided to launch an indiegogo campaign. I've 14 original songs I've written between the year 2000 and today. These songs are near and dear to me, so the concept in my head is to record them with as little instrumentation as possible, in other words acoustic guitar and vocal! let the songs speak for themselves.

Over the years I've helped so many artists bring their CD projects to fruition, now it's time for me. I hope you'll consider helping me. At this point, my project had stalled out,  my indiegogo campaign has kicked in and I'm already seeing some new wind in the sails!  

I've been a musician all my life and have been making my living with it since the mid 80s. It's been a rough road but I've no regrets. I've had some of the most wonderful experiences through my music, traveling the world, touring with many different bands and artists.

Now I think I have something to say (or sing), more songs are coming so it would be good to get my first solo effort off the ground so I could perhaps pave the way for a second, or 3rd! I'm so excited and again, thank you for your help. 

Thanks for reading, and thanks for contributing should you choose to do so.

 

more about Vito:

 

Vito Petroccitto is magic. And we’re not just talking about the way he deftly casts alternating spells on his audiences, moving them either to awe, tears, full-out belly laughs, or all three at once. Armed only with his gritty, dirty, swampy telecaster guitar, his crazy-good vocal chords, and more than a touch of genius, Vito has somehow figured out how to do the work of ten men. If he’s not performing all over the Hudson Valley with “Four Guys in Disguise” (the band he co-founded in 1989, voted “Best of the Hudson Valley” for years running), he’s out gigging with his newest brainchild, “Left by the Wayside:” a swampy blues and funk band. Think Little Feat meets John Fogerty meets the Grateful Dead.
And if he’s not rocking around the valley with his own two bands, he’s opening for major acts like Eddie Money, The Doobie Brothers, Orleans, NRBQ, The Rascals, The Chris Barrons Band (lead vocalist for the Spin Doctors) and Deep Banana Blackout—to name a few.
Well, anyone can open for big acts. Sure. But how about getting right up in there with them? Vito has backed up the likes of Sloan Wainwright, Professor Louie and the Cromatix, The Willie Amrod Band and David Roth, both nationally and internationally.
Still not getting the picture? The list goes on. He’s performed with Merl Saunders, Tony Levin, Peter Levin, Jerry Marotta, Joe Brouchard, John Platania, Tommy Byrnes, Pete Seeger, Buddy Cage, John Hall and Larry Hoppen, Freebo, Severin Browne, Penny Nichols and Ritt Henn as well.
So what does Vito do with his remaining gobs of spare time? Just a few light and fluffy things: he teaches guitar, writes music for his band and for commercial enterprises (like Interpay, the fourth largest payroll company in the U.S., or, perhaps, the YANKEES), acts, produces, owns and operates Studio 1061, performs on PBS documentaries and radio shows across the nation, records album after album after album of his own, sits as a session musician, and—oh yeah—raises twins with his wife.
You’d think the man would be exhausted. Burnt out. Ready to prop his feet up on a chaise lounge on some breathtaking beach somewhere in the Caribbean. You know, rest on his laurels a little.
If you think that, then you don’t know Vito Petroccitto (with two “t’s” and two “c-to’s”).
Vito is a true artist, born of a true artist. He has lived, breathed and (hardly) slept music all his life. Moreover, he is a true entertainer. He is happiest with his telecaster strapped around his neck, but his versatility lends the depth and staying power necessary to make his art a lifelong career. He takes on anything and everything—within the bounds of personal integrity, of course—and what sets him apart is the way he dives in, whole-hog, always bringing his full-on passion, remarkable and wide-ranging technique and skill, boundless energy, and genuine soul-smile to each and every endeavor.
Vito Petroccitto is larger than life, both literally and figuratively. If you don’t leave an encounter with him smiling your head off, you may have no soul.

story:
Studio Diary // Студийный Дневник:

Jointstereo greets Indiegogo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cKdMM7bltQ0

Chapter 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VXfJAlfdaIo

Chapter 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-g5hYBJ8PHM

Chapter 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z-UMRrHLPFE

 

For English description scroll the page please.

 

Всем привет!

Мы Jointstereo — метал-группа из Краснодара, что в южных широтах России.

Раньше мы играли melodic death doom metal с элементами прог-рока и пост-метала, теперь же всё ровно наоборот — стало больше пост- и прогрессив-фишек, а дэт-дум становится лишь неким фоном, только это пока большой секрет.

Послушать и совершенно официально бесплатно скачать наши старые и средние песни можно на нашей страничке на Last.fm: http://last.fm/music/Jointstereo — а о новых песнях ниже.

Год назад мы выпустили первый лонгплей, который называется «Refract The Fears», а сейчас мы собираемся записать новый. Так мы плавно переходим к следующему разделу.

Собственно, альбом

Итак, подробности, которые мы можем раскрыть:

  • Записывать пластинку мы будем под чутким руководством Владимира Трухана. Вова — это человек-идея, человек-энергия и человек-уши. С его помощью мы сможем добиться действительно мощного результата. А ещё он угощает нас очень вкусным рулетом.
  • Основная часть собираемой суммы — оплата записи, сведения и мастеринга. Что это за слова, вам может рассказать Википедия. Но чтобы прояснить, каждая песня обходится нам не менее, чем в 400 долларов. И это без дополнительных текущих трат вроде покупки струн для гитар и пластиков для барабанов.
  • А ещё нужно диски напечатать — это отдельная статья расходов (1000 долларов — как с куста). Мы не подписаны ни с какими лейблами, потому делаем это самостоятельно.
  • Если наберём сумму больше заявленной, то напечатаем дополнительный тираж дисков, а также сможем, не продавая последние штаны, оплатить изготовление плюшек, которые получат наши дорогие фандеры, ибо перки мы в сумму не закладываем.
  • Пластинку мы планируем выпустить, если всё будет хорошо, в середине осени. Все плюшки вы получите в дни релиза.

Результат

С вашей помощью мы сможем записать пластинку, которая наверняка будет как минимум на голову выше первого альбома по всем параметрам: уровень материала, качество звука и так далее.

Те, кто отзовётся на наш призыв, получат, например, лимитированную версию альбома, которая будет отличаться — внимание! — не только оформлением, но и содержанием, а также, в зависимости от размера пожертвования, разные славные подарки и благодарности.

Те, кто получат футболку или худи, смогут выбрать вариант дизайна (для вас мерч будет особенный, именной) и нужный размер.

Как ещё нам помочь

Если вы не можете помочь нам деньгами, либо хотите оказать какую-то иную помощь в дополнение к пожертвованию, вы смело можете рассказывать всем своим друзьям и знакомым о нас и о нашем призыве. Всем отозвавшимся наше безграничное уважение!

 

_________________

 

Hi everyone!

We are Jointstereo, a metal band from Krasnodar, which is located in a hot south of cold Russia.

We played melodic death doom metal with some post-metal and prog-rock features, but now it's upside down, here comes much more post- and prog-stuff in our music. Death and doom are just a kind of background now. But we said it under the rose, okay?

You can listen to some of our old and mid songs officcially and free on our Last.fm page: http://last.fm/music/Jointstereo — and you can read about the new ones below.

A year ago we've released a first LP called "Refract The Fears", and now we are going to record a second one.

An album itself

Here are some details:

  • We are going to record an album under the guidance of Vladimir Trukhan. Vladimir is a triple superhero: Ideaman, Energyman and Earsman. We can achieve a great result with his help.
  • The main part of the sum is a payment for recording, mixing and mastering. You can check on Wikipedia the meaning of these words. To be clear, every song costs us at least $400 without additional stuff like the new strings or drumheads.
  • Also we have to print the CDs, this is a separate cost (at least $1000). We are not signed with any label, so we do it on our pat.
  • If we rise more than the stated sum, we'll print the additional CD copies and also will be able to make the perks without selling our last pants, 'cuz we do not include these expences.
  • If everything goes well, we'll release an album in the middle of fall. You'll get your perks around the release date. 

Result

With your help we will be able to record an album which will be at least a cut above our first LP on all counts.

Our donators will get for example a limited version of an album which will be different (attn!) not only by it's design, but also by it's content, and, depending on the size of donations, different great gifts and gratitudes.

These of you who will get a tshirt or a hoodie, will be able to choose a special signature design and an exact size you need.

Other ways to help

If you can't help us with money or you want to provide your assistance in addition to your donation, you can share our music and this page with all your mates. We say thank you to every single one of you who responds to our call.
story_txt:
Studio Diary // Студийный Дневник:

Jointstereo greets Indiegogo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cKdMM7bltQ0
Chapter 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VXfJAlfdaIo
Chapter 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-g5hYBJ8PHM
Chapter 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z-UMRrHLPFE

А ещё нужно диски напечатать — это отдельная статья расходов (1000 долларов — как с куста). Мы не подписаны ни с какими лейблами, потому делаем это самостоятельно.

story:
Joan Baez once said you could sing a Carter Family song around any campfire in the world and someone would know the song. I'd like to test that notion and take it further.

I WANNA SING GOSPEL SONGS IN RUSSIA

I have been invited by my friend, Mitya Kuznetsov, to perform in his summer festival in Rybinsk, Russia. Mitya is an acclaimed Russian folk musician and founding member of the folk group, Seventh Water from Russia. I want to take these Carter Family gospel and spiritual songs and more to Russia and teach the harmonies to the musicians and the people there. I want to open the door to the discussion of these regional country melodies and harmonies. I am looking to explore and chronicle how they stir the soul of Russians half a word away.

 

MUSIC IS AS CLOSE AS WE GET TO WHERE WE'VE COME FROM

I grew up in a fundamental Christian church singing hymns with no accompaniment. I learned harmonies from singing and listening. My grandmother taught me to read shape notes and to sing these songs from the heart. She was a huge fan of the Carter Family. Particularly their gospel songs, "Keep On The Sunny Side," "Never Grow Old," "Working on a Building" and "Will the Circle Be Unbroken." The lyrics of these songs reach for an understanding of the spirit. But to me the melodies and the harmonies are just as important. Even without the lyrics, many of these songs tell a story. Stories of yearning and regret. Stories of searching deep inside ourselves for an understanding of our own spirits. As the Persian poet Rumi asks, "Where did I come from and what am I supposed to be doing?"

 

THE PLAN

Here's what I'd like to do. I will travel to Rybinsk, Russia in mid-July and stay for three weeks. During that time I will teach Russian folk and country musicians these songs and the harmonies that are traditional to these songs. I am looking to mix the old-time gospel and country flavor with the Russian flavor. My fellow explorer, Mitya Kuznetsov is an accomplished Russian musician and producer of folk music from Russia, China, Scotland and the music of Native America. I will bring home the results of our collaboration.

Your donation will help cover:

-Transportation costs to and from Rybinsk, Russia.  And travel within Russia

-Housing and boarding costs

-Production costs for the project, including studio fees and post-production costs

story:
Joel Laviolette and Ben Robinette are excited to share this new matepe DVD with the world!  This is a world's first:  a DVD where we made a closeup video of each player's hands so you can watch what each persons fingers is doing.  A really cool feature of DVDs is that we can have multiple audio streams to choose from, so you can listen to each individual matepe, or both parts together!  Also, we are able to offer the music at a much higher quality than even CDs can offer. 

This is a very short campaign!  only 10 days! 


We are doing it at 10 days purely because we are treating this as a chance to pre-order the DVD before the holidays! 


Some details about the DVD:

  • Recorded at a very high quality: 96khz-more than double the quality of a standard CD
  • Multiple audio streams so you can listen to individual parts or both parts together.
  • We recorded with two different tunings-Chawasarira's "higher" tuning, and the lower-more common-tuning.
  • The video uses a very fast framerate camera so you can really see the movement of the fingers with minimal blur.

Check out the perks below to see the ordering options-you can get on the "thank you" section of the DVD, or if you really want to help support this, you can become an Executive Producer and get your name in the credits!

story:
Most people don't know that deep down, Prince was a seriously DIY punker kid. So many days made so much better because of those songs.

In honor of and in thanks for all the joyful moments given to the world through his music we are selling these limited edition pins. We will donate 100% of the money including costs to the Little Kids Rock Foundation(www.littlekidsrock.org). 


If we all love music as much as we post about it let's put our money where our mouth is and support the next generation. Music education is being stripped from schools at a frightening pace. We can all help build something positive from this loss.

A little bit goes a long way. Just $25 will pay for a years worth of music lessons for one child. All paperwork will be public so you can be sure everything is going to the charity. 

Thanks,

Matthew & Shawn

story:
Story:

Hey what’s up friends, fam, fans, and internet strangers I haven’t met yet, my name is Josh Collins, an r&b/soul singer, songwriter from Philadelphia, Pa. I'm glad you're here! Look.. My bio with all my musical history is on my website www.coupeproduct.com... Allow me to share a little of my story.

I finally released my six song EP, titled “Up Til Dawn” on August 7th...

My pop says I need to stop writing love songs, and I agree with him sometimes, but with the way I'm trying to portray it through music, I think we could all stand to hear and be reminded that love and simplicity in reality, still exists..

The purpose of this campaign is to raise funds that'll be used to make not only a great video, but the continuation of what I think is really good life music.. Beyond that.. I JUST WANT YOUR SUPPORT! Ill be once again working with amazing director, Kevin Chung who not only filmed, but who also wrote the treatment and produced a seldom shown love story in “AlmostThere”. In the fall I would like to bring a visual story to my next single and fam  favorite "Elsewhere" produced by Harry Wilson with additional production by Mario Crew. I can't wait to show all of you whats next with this record. So please donate! Help me make this thing happen. Love you and appreciate you all always. Peace..

 

What I Need & What You Get:

$3000 for a music video. Here is the breakdown of funds.

- Director Fees

- Editor Fees

- Cast Fees

- Equipment & Props Fees

 

What I Already Have:

- Song, Story, Director, Stylist and Photographer. I'm ready, I hope you all are. 

 

Other Ways You Can Support:

If you cannot donate to my campaign, there are other ways to help me besides contributing financially. Please:

- Share this campaign page

- Share my videos 

- Come out to my next event

story:
We are....

Death in Motion!! diM. started in 2006 with the common love of heavy music and darker theatrics. After 8 years of perseverance, sweat, and paint, we are seeing strides of progress and now we look to the one constant in those 8 years for help to take it even further....our fans.

This year we have started doing more and more out of town dates. The Gathering,(which is a four day festival with thousands of attendies) as well as some dates on our way home, and the Project Independent Tour coming in the fall. We are working to gather funds together for travel, taking care of our volunteering crew, and merchandise. These dates could help push us closer to the national stages and festivals we have been working to achieve. 

All donations will be rewarded with everything we can think of including merchandise, some cool exclusives, and the kitchen sink (if it comes to that). Any extra funds we pull from this will be applied to working on the next album.

The Goal and The Rewards!!!

Our target is $6000. This will help with the  renting of a vehicle and trailer, fuel, keep us and the crew fed, all merchandise stocked for the shows, and as mentioned anything over will go right into the recording. We wanna keep you all entertained and engaged so every dollar goes right into what you will get in the future.

We will be offering CD's, t-shirts, stickers, signed memorabilia, and other cool stuff like customized birthday messages from the band. Plus, whatever we can come up with a long the way!


How You Effect Things!!

This campaign will help diM. spread the word on a grander scale. This will strengthen the foundation and build a reputable product. Helping put us in front of new people, new promoters, and new acts to plant the seed in new soil.

We want to get to you, and perform in your area. We have been working and building for it, your help is letting us take the steps needed to make it happen!

The Dangers!

We could die!! In a ball of flames!! In our sleep!! Or.....probably not. The van could just break down, equipment breaks. Guess what? Any contributions could help that too!!!

We aren't saying this could make us the next Metallica. We are saying this is a good step to play in front of larger audiences and entertain more people. A good step for us to play more out of town shows and create more music sooner than later.

We have seen highs and lows and you guys have always seen us through. We can't thank you enough.
 

Every Little Bit Helps!!!

Some of you may just not have the funds to help, but you are still a valuable member of this family!! And your time is just as valuable as any amount of money. SHARE!! Spread the word in anyway. Know someone who needs a cause? Tell them! Someone who has never heard us? Tell them! Get the word out loud and often!

We love you for all your time, love, and hard work!

Spread the word in anyway. Know someone who needs a cause? Tell them! Someone who has never heard us? Tell them! Get the word out loud and often!We love you for all your time, love, and hard work!

story:
Music is my Life.if you know me or don't but support hard working dreamers please help.My name is Billy Joe Daniel I won the Solo/Duo title at the Nachal Blues Network Divison of the I.B.C or International Blues Challenge and have to compete in the Finals in Memphis TN ,In January 2016 I will be playing 99% original music during the finals of the competition. And will email a free download of my original acoustic album(due October) to anyone who donates.If you donate a $100 or more and get signed photo & CD.Hell I'll give you a live performance in your living room if I'm not booked and ya live near by :)

I'm a Father, I Work and Perform Professionally. I'm asking for help not a free ride I'm putting up the majority of the funds myself.any help is greatly appreciated. God Bless TCB⚡

Contact@Facebook : Billy Joe Daniel

 Facebook: Billy Joe Trio

billyjoedaniel@gmail.com

story:
ABOUT US

We are SYMPULS-E from Ryazan, Russia. We've been playing progressive melodic metal for 9 years already.

Our discography:

  • 2012 - Destroying The Barriers (LP)
  • 2013 - Generate Reincarnation (Single)
  • 2015 - Solarstorm (LP)
  • 2016 - System Duality (Single)

"MIRROR CITY"

This release is our debut work, it’s called "Zerkalo Goroda" ("Mirror City"). It was recorded in 2008, but released in 2010, we think that many people didn't hear this album. 

We hope this album remains relevant and feel that it deserves to take a place in our official discography - that's one of the main reasons for us to do a remake. 

Besides, one more reason to do a remake is the fact that sound on this album does not fit into the format of the modern sounding, lyrics are written in Russian, so we decided to translate the texts into English to bring them to more listeners around the world.
Moreover, we amended arrangements and riffs to make our sound better and fresher. 

Unfortunately, we do not have a label that could finance us with recording, mixing, mastering and the publication, that’s the reason we are calling for your help.

NEW SHAPE

New cover art

Tracklist:

1. Monolith of The Soul
2. Silver Wings
3. City of The Void
4. Stellar River
5. In The Mirrors
6. My World
7. Nocturnal Blade
8. Eternity Behind...
9. C.O.D.A.

story:
Hello! 

I am a singer/songwriter/producer from South London and have just announced the release of a new EP entitled Break and Reshape.

Here is the press release for the EP:

Taking over a year and a half to create, alternative songwriter/producer Tony Volker’s 5th release is his most electronic work to date.  The work is influenced by producers Jon Hopkins and Ori Alboher, contemporary artists such as Glass Animals, Pusha T and Thom Yorke and 70s soul artists such as Darondo. Digital sonic experimentation was at the forefront of the creative process; in a slight departure from previous styles, sampled acoustic instruments are programmed and arranged around Volker’s haunting and emotive vocal as he focuses on lost love and the renegotiation of independence.  The raw emotional directness of his lyrics marks Break and Reshape as a truly powerful piece of work.

You can preview a few of the tracks here

https://soundcloud.com/tonyvolker/sets/break-and-reshape-ep-1

I feel that in a world saturated with DIY musicians, some of the music can get swamped and never heard. That is why I want to release this properly and so I need backing to give the music the release I feel it deserves. As I am working completely independently without label backing I am now looking for some backing to help with the cost of mastering,printing and distribution. 

I appreciate that some people don't have much spare money to spend so any help at all, or simply spreading the word to people who might be interested, would be much appreciated!

Thanks for reading and I hope you like the look of some of the rewards

Best Wishes

Tony


PS I want to thank everyone who has helped with the process so far and a special thanks to  the very brilliant Ruth Esme Mitchell who designed the artwork for the EP

http://ruthesmemitchell.tumblr.com

story:
Our Story

Philadelphia Baroque Orchestra Tempesta di Mare, hailed by Fanfare for its “abundant energy, immaculate ensemble, impeccable intonation, and undeniable sense of purpose,” has performed some of the best baroque music you've never heard. Our performances have included more than 35 modern-time world premieres and can be heard in Philadelphia, on tour, on radio stations worldwide, and on CD.

In June, we are returning to the studio to record a second disc with orchestral music for the theater by Charpentier, Rameau and Leclair for our project  called Comédie et Tragédie. That's right, Volume 2! This, our 10th release on the British label Chandos, is scheduled for release in 2016. Volume 1 has already garnered rave reviews and "CD of the week" picks. This project has received generous support from the Pew Center for Arts and Heritage, with additional  support from the William Penn Foundation and The Presser Foundation. 

Now we are asking for your help to put on the finishing touches before we "raise the curtain" for this, our most ambitious project to date. Thank You!

Comédie & Tragédie, Vol II :

  • Jean-Marie Leclair’s tragedy Scylla et Glaucus
  • Jean-Philippe Rameau’s ballet Les Fêtes de Polymnie &
  • Marc-Antoine Charpentier music for the comedy Le Malade imaginaire.

Why this music, and why Tempesta?

French baroque music sports two key ingredients: dance rhythms and the French language itself. When this music was new in the 1750's, all this was common knowledge: no need to tell musicians how fast to play, say, a minuet, or how to lilt a line to mimic the short and long syllables in spoken word. Everybody knew that!  A modern-day ensemble has to recreate this musical language and learn how to speak with a similar accent. But once you get it, this music is pure fun. After we performed the Marias and Rebel from Volume 1, the Philadelphia Inquirer noted: "Tempesta played with such energy and color that the witt, emotion and drolleries that define French art were brought to pulsing life". 
Volume 2 will once again feature our full orchestra— winds, percussion, strings, continuo, and three trumpets — 28 musicians in all! Led by directors Gwyn Roberts (flute/recorder) and Richard Stone (theorbo/guitar) with concertmaster Emlyn Ngai, Tempesta performs all orchestral music without a conductor, as was the practice when this music was new. While you might not be able to "see" this on a recording, you will certainly "hear" the galloping horses, churning waves and dancing upholsterers.

How you can help

Your tax-deductible contribution will help raise the remaining funds needed to make Comédie & Tragédie, Vol II happen. Our goal for this campaign is to defray some of the immediate costs of the recording sessions, such as renting our recording space, Gould Hall at the Curtis Institute of Music, and engaging long-time Tempesta engineer Loren Stata.

Thank you’s for you

Most importantly, we thank you. Obviously we couldn’t make this happen without you!

But just to make it better, we've come up with some fun perks: track downloads, dedications in the CD booklet, autographed CD copies, a handmade trivet, featuring the Comédie & Tragédie logo, and tickets to celebrate the recording with the musicians and Tempesta Board at a reception and dinner on June 9, 2015.

“Why should I support this?”

Perhaps you already know and love Tempesta. Or perhaps you love all things French. Either way, this 2-Volume set will make a great addition to your music library and hopefully will become a favorite to listen to. 

You can also share our campaign via the built-in Facebook and Twitter tools!

Tempesta di Mare has a long track record of producing projects of lauded quality and creativity.  This project will be no different. Critics have said this about our previous Chandos releases:

  • “ ★★★★★ …essential listening” — BBC Music Magazine
  • “…superb performances; …highly recommended” — Fanfare Magazine
  • “…convivial from start to finish” — Gramophone Awards Issue

Thank you so much for making it happen again!

story:
** SHIPPING NOTICE: Please add 2€ under "custom" for CDs and 5€ for Vinyl and T-Shirt bundles! Perks are now updated with the correct information, those requested before remain booked. 

*** INTERNATIONAL shipping may vary, contact us, if you're pre-ordering from outside of Germany.

For english, see below:


Hey.

Mit welchen Worten eröffnet man eine solche Kampagne? Vincent würde jetzt sagen: "Ja... Einen wunderschönen guten Abend, (hier Ort einfügen). Wir sind DRAWING CIRCLES, kommen aus Bonn und freuen uns schon sehr hier heute Abend für euch spielen zu dürfen." 

Doch heute geht es um etwas anderes, nämlich um die Veröffentlichung unseres Debütalbums im Herbst 2015.

Ein Ziel, welches wir nur mit eurer Hilfe erreichen können. 
Wie vielleicht einige von euch wissen haben wir im Laufe der Zeit sehr viele Songs live gespielt, die nie aufgenommen wurden und deshalb früher oder später für uns unter den Tisch fielen – Letzten Herbst haben wir uns nun dazu entschlossen es wirklich anzugehen und neue Songs für unser erstes Album zu sammeln, zu hüten und aufzunehmen. 

Für das Album selber haben wir sehr genaue Vorstellungen und Ideen, konnten erste Visionen erarbeiten und wollen ein Produkt schaffen welches uns als Band voll und ganz repräsentiert, musikalisch wie auch visuell und haptisch.

Dadurch dass wir selbstständig und unabhängig von Musiklabels an diesem Album arbeiten, gibt es viele (vor allem finanzielle) Hürden die wir aus eigener Kraft nicht bewältigen können. Wenn Ihr unsere Kampagne unterstützt, helft ihr uns diese Idee (mit folgenden konkreten Inhalten)  zu realisieren:

  • Mastering
  • Fotos und Artwork
  • Vervielfältigung: Vinyl, CD-Digipak und Kassette
  • Promotion und Öffentlichkeitsarbeit
  • Merchandise 
  • Videoproduktion
Wohin geht meine Hilfe?
Wir haben das riesige Glück, ein Studio im familiären Kreis zur Verfügung zu haben, deshalb fielen für uns bisher nie riesige Kosten für die eigentliche Studioarbeit an. Unser Album werden wir auch dort aufnehmen und mischen. Wir haben an einigen Ecken bereits tatkräftige Helfer, dennoch müssen wir alles Weitere finanziell selber auf die Beine stellen. Wir haben uns einiges vorgenommen um die Musik die wir aufnehmen auch visuell und haptisch passend zu präsentieren.

So werden wir zum Beispiel zusammen mit Robert Winter (einem begnadeten Fotografen) einen ferneren Schauplatz bereisen und die Gestaltung des Cover-Artworks von Gizem Winter und Ihm übernehmen lassen. 

Insgesamt beläuft sich unsere Kalkulation auf etwa 7500€, dieser Betrag würde die oben aufgeführten Punkte realisierbar machen. Alles darüber hinaus würden wir für die Tour, weitere Videos oder eine breitere Merchandise-Palette aufwenden.
 
Was ist, wenn wir den Betrag nicht erreichen?
Sollten wir den angestrebten Betrag nicht erreichen, würden wir die Liste nach Priorität von hinten kürzen und uns in erster Linie um die Pressung des Albums kümmern. Anders als bei einem festen Zielbetrag, bei welchem das gesetzte Ziel erreicht werden muss damit die Kampagne gelingt, haben wir uns für einen flexiblen Betrag entschieden. So geht jeder gespendete Betrag an uns, jede kleine und große Spende hilft uns sehr. Selbstverständlich gilt aber auch hier die Regel "the more, the merrier".

Für jede Hilfe sind wir euch unendlich dankbar. Hoffentlich sehen wir uns auf der Tour dieses Jahr, mit einem Album im Gepäck.

- Drawing Circles
 
//

Hey.

We have no idea how to open this campaign. Vincent would probably say: "Alright... Good evening (insert location here). We are DRAWING CIRCLES from Bonn and we can't wait to play for you tonight." 

But today, we want to talk to you about something else, about the release of our very first record in the fall of 2015. 

This is something we can only achieve with your help! As some of you might know, we have played a lot of songs live that we have never recorded and have gradually fallen under the table. Last fall, however, we decided to gather and record these songs for our first album.

We have a very precise prospect of the album itself, we were able to develop first visions and we want to create a product which represents us wholeheartedly as a band, musically and visually.

There are a lot of obstacles to overcome, since we are producing and recording this album independently. Most of them are financial hurdles, which we cannot surmount on our own. Should you decide to support our campaign, you will help us make the following happen:

  • Mastering
  • Photos and artwork
  • Pressings of digipaks, vinyl and cassette-tapes
  • Promotion and marketing
  • Merchandise 
  • Video production
Where will my money go?
Luckily, we have a recording studio in our family environment at our disposal, hence we never really had any costs for studio work. Our album will be recorded and mixed there, too. We already have active supporters and helpers in all corners, but still we have to line up everything else financially, since we want to present it haptic and visually fitting to you.

For instance, we will travel to a remote setting with Robert Winter (an exceptionally gifted photographer) and leave the artwork design to Gizem Winter and him.

To sum it up, our calculation adds up to 7500€, this amount of money would make the above-named list realizable. If we can generate more money, we would spend it on our tour, on a larger palette of merchandise or more music videos.

What if we do not reach the amount?
Should we not reach the desired amount of money, we will shorten the list starting on the bottom, and focus on pressing the album first. Other than with a fixed plan, where we only get the money, if the desired amount of money is reached, we have chosen the flexible plan, so every donation will end up in our piggy bank. Every donation can and will help us. But of course, "the more, the merrier".

We are infinitely grateful for every kind of help. We hope to see you on tour this year, with our very first album. 

Yours,

Drawing Circles

story:
"Godzilla vs. Poutine" - projet de musique et de B.D. 

Chers amis,
Robbob lance son nouvel album avec la participation du Limoilou Libre Orchestra et plusieurs illustres musiciens invités. Cet album numérique sortira dans un livret en couleur (avec code de téléchargement) dans lequel dix illustrateurs talentueux offrent leurs versions de l'univers B.D.-esque de Robbob.
Voici une occasion de nous aider à compléter ce projet monstre ; vos contributions aideront à payer les frais d'enregistrement, d'impression et de distrubution.
Nous offrons plusieurs forfaits où vous pouvez obtenir l'album numérique en format B.D., le CD et le T-Shirt "Limoilou Libre", un spectacle ou des bouteilles de  sauce Damn! Vous pouvez nous aider également en partageant cette campagne dans vos réseaux sociaux.
Merci de votre soutien!
Un avant-goût de cette méchante poutine:  https://robbob.bandcamp.com/album/godzilla-vs-p...

"Godzilla vs. Poutine" - music and comic project 

Dear friends,

Robbob is releasing a new album with the participation of the Limoilou Libre Orchestra and several illustrious guest musicians. This digital album will be available as a colour booklet (with download code) in which ten talented artists from across Canada provide illustrations of Robbob's cartoon-y universe.

Here's an opportunity to help us complete this monstrous project; your contributions will help pay for recording, printing and distribution costs.

We are offering many perks in this campaign - the feature album, but also our CD, T-shirt, live performances and bottles of Damn! hot sauce. You can also help by sharing this campaign on your social networks.

Thanks for your support! 

Here's a taste of this big bad poutine:  https://robbob.bandcamp.com/album/godzilla-vs-p...

Robbob lance son nouvel album avec la participation du Limoilou Libre Orchestra et plusieurs illustres musiciens invités. Merci de votre soutien!
Un avant-goût de cette méchante poutine:  https://robbob.bandcamp.com/album/godzilla-vs-p...


"Godzilla vs. Poutine" - music and comic project 
Dear friends,
Robbob is releasing a new album with the participation of the Limoilou Libre Orchestra and several illustrious guest musicians. This digital album will be available as a colour booklet (with download code) in which ten talented artists from across Canada provide illustrations of Robbob's cartoon-y universe.
Here's an opportunity to help us complete this monstrous project; your contributions will help pay for recording, printing and distribution costs.
We are offering many perks in this campaign - the feature album, but also our CD, T-shirt, live performances and bottles of Damn! hot sauce. You can also help by sharing this campaign on your social networks.
Thanks for your support! 
Here's a taste of this big bad poutine:  https://robbob.bandcamp.com/album/godzilla-vs-p...

story:
What's this all about?

Earlier this year, I made the decision to realize my life-long dream of recording original music. I teamed up with a friend to produce and develop my debut EP "The Secret Room." Up to this point, the process has been very rewarding and very personal, but the project is no longer something I can pursue on my own. I need help covering the costs of recording the remaining tracks for the EP - that's right, remaining tracks! The first single has already been completed and released, and if you haven't heard it yet, I'm delighted to share it with you below.


Now that you have a taste for the music we are making, I hope you're as excited about the project as I am! The other songs are written, ideas are brewing, and the desire is there. All that's missing are the means necessary to turn them into something tangible, wrap a ribbon around them, and deliver them to you. 

I believe in this music, and I believe that something very special is bubbling just under the surface. I hope you believe in me and that together, we can see this endeavor through.

Budget Breakdown

  • Studio time (1 week) & mixing: $1750 
  • Mastering: $150
  • Session drummer: $150
  • Online distribution: $100
  • Copyrights: $100
  • IndieGoGo & processing fees (roughly 10%): $250

  • TOTAL: $2500

What You get

All contributors will receive a free download of the EP in addition to a slew of other nifty perks. Any funds raised beyond the base goal of $2500 will go toward expanding the project creatively; depending on the amount, this could mean ext, ra studio time, printing physical copies of the CD, having videos and other promotional items made, etc.

    Risks & Challenges

    Bringing songs to life is always a challenge. There's plenty of room for human error, and there's plenty of room for error beyond human control: people get sick, the power goes out, equipment breaks. Art is unpredictable and rarely goes as planned, but that's part of what makes the end result so fulfilling. The roadblocks and heartaches are characters that at first seem undesirable, but when all is said and done, the story wouldn't be the same without them. My heart is set on finishing this project, and I won't be content until I've done just that.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Even if you are unable to contribute monetarily, you are still an integral part of this campaign. Why? Because you have the power to spread the word! Tell your friends, tell your family, tell your mail-person. Word of mouth is unbeatable, especially in the era of social media. Share this on your Facebook, your Twitter, your Tumblr. You never know who might be reading - they could be the one to make this happen.

story:
Hello Shadows, thank you for checking out our fund-raising campaign!

Over the past couple of years, we've met thousands of you on our travels as we've partied up and down the UK, and without your love, support, and friendship, Speaking in Shadows wouldn't exist at all.

As a way of saying a proper thank you, we wanted to find a way to involve you more closely in both our music, and our lives, and with the release of our new EP this summer, we decided this was the perfect opportunity to do so.


The Lies We Lead

Over the past six months, we've been working tirelessly to bring you something extra special, and we're ecstatic to announce that, on 15th July, we'll be releasing our new EP: 'The Lies We Lead'.

We're heading to Regal House Studio at the end of May to record the new tracks, and we've decided to set up this campaign to allow us to make this release as incredible as we can, whilst giving you all new ways to be a part of Speaking in Shadows.


The Campaign

All funds raised in this campaign will go towards designing, recording, and printing the EP. The £1,000 target will go a long way to helping us with this, but by no means covers our costs. We therefore hope to exceed this figure to allow us the opportunity to fund other related aspects, such as our upcoming music videos and new merchandise, giving you all the greatest experience possible.

To show our appreciation for your support, we have tried to include a range of exclusive perks and merchandise that you won't find elsewhere. This not only gives you the chance to get involved directly with us and the EP, but means you'll always have something special with which to remember the release.

We hope you're as excited about these perks as we are, and that they give you a better insight into our world!


The Perks

If you have any queries about any of the perks, please email us at info@speakinginshadows.co.uk, and we'll clear them up for you!


Show your support

Whether you are able to purchase any of our perks or not, there are numerous ways to get involved in the campaign to help us further:

  • Share the news of our EP release & campaign with your family and friends! Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Tumblr - or even old-fashioned word of mouth: they all help!

  • Use the hashtag: #TheLiesWeLead and share our campaign link to give it some buzz!

  • Come along to shows we play! This is why we're in a band in the first place: to meet and party with you all. See you out there!


FAQ

Q. How will I receive my downloadable EP?

A. On the day of release, you will receive an email with the EP, plus artwork to download.

Q. Will I be charged today or at the end of the campaign?

A. You will be charged upon purchase of your chosen perk.

Q. What do I do if I want multiple perks?

A. You will need to purchase these separately.

Q. When will I receive my Skype call / Skype lesson?

A. We will contact you via email to make arrangements.

Q. How will you know which lyrics I want framed & signed?

A. We will contact you via email to find out your choice of song.

Q. How will you know what size/colour t-shirt I would like?

A. We will contact you via email to find out.

Q. What time will I need to be at the studio for the gang vocals, and what is the studio's address?

A. We will contact you via email with this information after you have selected this perk. If you need to find out prior to purchase, please email us at info@speakinginshadows.co.uk

Q. What date will the Speaking in Shadows Experience be?

A. We will contact you via email after purchase, to arrange a day that works for both you and us.

Q. I live outside of the UK and want to purchase a perk; is this possible?

A. Yes it is. Please email info@speakinginshadows.co.uk and we'll discuss the details.

If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@speakinginshadows.co.uk


THANK YOU FOR EVERYTHING!


Speaking in Shadows

Adam, Lewis, Ali, Sam, and Grant

story: I don't want to come off as primarily egocentric in doing this, but in the three years since my departure/removal from my last ever increasingly terrible music project, I have struggled a lot to come back to my roots/soul. I need a good amount of equipment I can't really afford to achieve my own dreams, and was contemplating making some kind of kickstarter to get me back on track. My ultimate goal in life is to write and perform the most amazing music you have not heard yet, and if you truly believe in me I need your help. Please like/comment this status if you think you qualify, and that I'm worthy of this kind of contribution from you. I promise you all with every fiber of my being I will give back in reciprocity 100 fold and if everyone of my current network friends even contributes 1 dollar, that I could make this a reality. thank you all for hearing me out. I honestly feel both inspires and ashamed in asking. That's how you know I'm a true artist haha. Luck and love to you all. You make my dreams need to become real

story:
Hello, my name is Mark Chernek,

I am a US Marine Veteran who served in Beirut Lebanon with the 32nd, MAU HMM261, in 1982.  I am a aviation engineer by trade, however during my free time, as a hobby I play the guitar, and perform as a singer song writer throughout the Netherlands, Belgium and Germany. I along with my Dutch partner Linda, have created a registered non profit foundation called Music 4 Vets Netherland.  http://www.music4vets.nl/ After conversing with Dutch Veterans and performing investigating research we found in the Netherlands a need for a different approach in helping veterans re-adjust back into society after their tours of duty in hostilities around the globe.  Veterans are not only damaged physically, but also mentally from their experiences in hostile environments.

Music 4 Vets Nederland is a Veteran initiative, with the concept of using music to help heal the scars of war, and to help the veterans release built up emotions, by using music as a therapeutic device.  Music 4 Vets Nederland needs your help, I can't do this alone, but together we can achieve great improvements in how we deal and approach Veterans who are lost in society.  Our Government and society has placed a stigma on veterans returning from hostile environments, Veterans returning from tours of duty in these environments feel a sense of helplessness, show little or no emotion, they withdraw from society along with their families and friends, they distance themselves from the ones they love and turn to other forms of release (such as illegal drugs and alcohol)  escaping the realities of our society in which they need to learn to adapt back into.  By supporting  our successful and proven foundation, you can help a veteran who fought for the freedoms and liberties you live by, to lead a healthy, normal and productive life, by using music to help them move forward into society.  

   Feel the healing power of music!

Music 4 Vets Nederland is in dire need of a reliable Multi Van so that we can transport our musical instruments and equipment, to the different Veteran events which we participate in throughout the year.  Some of these events include Miles 4 Justice,

Veterans day in the Hague, www.veteraneninstituut.nl  Veterans facilities throughout the Netherlands, and special events like the 70th anniversary of liberation day in Beek, We also play at benefit concerts for Wounded Warriors wounded warriors and Music 4 Vets Nederland fund raising events. The money that we generate  goes directly to Veterans initiatives as well as the foundation. Music 4 Vets Nederland, created the theme song Soldier, by Gavin Degraw, performed by Dutch Veteran, Niek Van Elderen for the Dutch Wounded Warriors Organization. Niek perfomed on the Dutch TV show, the Voice of Holland.

I also wrote the closing song  for  The High Price of Freedom a movie documentary, about the sacrifice of one soldier Harold B. McCarn during WWII.

 Music 4 Vets Nederland is in need of a good quality sound system with mixing board. We need amplifiers, electric guitars, acoustic guitars, drums, keyboards,  brass instruments, percussion instruments, microphones, stands, backing lighting, amplifiers.  Anything which is related to and associated with making music is important to us.  We need intruments to provide for the veteran who is in need, and can use the instrument as a devise to release built up energy to help ease the stress and tension a Veteran carries on their shoulders each and everyday.

We are in need of funding for studio purposes http://www.pebble-music.nl/so the Veterans can create a music CD, to help promote their music, and make awareness for PTSD, By contributing to this foundation you are giving a veteran a chance to re adjust back into society, you are helping a veteran and his/her self confidence, giving the veteran a sence of worth and contribution to society.  Most importantly you are giving hope to a more productive way of life, and future.The music helps heal the scars of war, and it is magical to see the transformation of a veteran in need, become alive again and a productive member of society.  We currently need to raise 40,000 Euros, in order to get this foundation moving forward. We need to be self sufficient and mobile to be able to get to venues and events and make our foundation useful to our customers when we perform.

                            Help make our dreams become reality!

All of the funding goes directly to the veterans in one form or another, administration cost as well.  The Veterans benefit directly from your contributions, and the foundation maintains that trust, that the veterans will receive the funding. 

You as contributors have a right to know how your hard earned money is being spent in this foundation, We keep records of where the financing is spent, and show how we use your contributions, through social media, veterans platforms and even a quarterly news letter, which we aim to create in the future.  It's important to stress that Music 4 Vets is more than just a Veteran band playing music, it's about healing and using musical instruments to aid in the healing process and helping Veterans with issues use the music as a form of release from everyday stresses and turmoil in life.  Some of the proceeds from this fund raising drive will be donated to the wounded warriors wounded warriors Netherlands.

  

By contributing, this is what you get depending on which perk package you choose!  Tickets to the Eyewitness museum in Beek Netherlands, commemorating the Netherlands involvement during WWII.  A must visit!! eyewitness. 

  Veteran Bracelet

 

We now have on offer for a limited time, Sarge's Personalized Paracord Bracelets.  You can also recieve a plate with Music 4 Vets Nederland if you wish, we have only three band colors to offer, Green, Black and Foliage green.  You can ask about what you would like on the plate but it must be simple, the photo's are only examples of what can be made. Sarge's Para                                                                                                               

 A Music 4 Vets CD avalable upon studio completion.

  Music 4 Vets Nederland Patch...

 A autographed copy of Roy Kolmers Book.

A personel autographed book by Marco Kroon, Knight of the military William Order recipient.  Comparable to the USA's Medal of Honor.

Donald William Tate, Australian  Vietnam wounded war Veteran, joins forces with Music 4 Vets Nederland.  We have to offer two signed books, from the author. Both books are fantasic reading, and should complimate anyones collection of military knowledge, Donald Tate is a decotated war hero, and these books are a must for any military buff.

Paul Woodadge (Author) The story of two 101st Airborne Screaming Eagle Medics on D-Day, June 6th, 1944. In Angoville-au-Plain, a small village between Utah Beach and Carentan, two medics treated over eighty casualties - American, German and French inside a 12th Century church. The book covers these events and also the history of the village throughout WWII.

Pat Kelly - Irish born singer, songwriter & guitarist,  "Alice Is Not In Wonderland" featuring 10 new songs recorded in New York and Copenhagen, was released worldwide in February 2011. Pat Kelly

  "Through the looking glass"

 

 A weekend get away for two at the Willow Springs Way Station, willowsprings B&B along with a horse back riding tour, and a tour of Bastone from a well Known tour guide from the local area, Ronald Stassen.relivehistory



      An Ibenez electric guitar

A fabulous weekend getaway for 2 people, including dinner for 2 people, at the Eurotel, Atals Hotel in scenic valkenburg, Atlashotel along with a WWII guided tour from local tour guide Ronald Stassen to US Cemetery Margraten, and the Maastricht area. http://www.relivehistory44-45.com  Tickets to the valkenburg castle,

And tikets to the Valkenburg caves.

Plus a gift voucher to Thermae  2000 in Valkenburg. Thermae

And many more perks just choose the one that suits you best!!!

As a NCO in the Marines, I learned the tools and the capabilities of good, sound leadership. I gain the trust of individuals, and instill in them a sense of self worth and give them that can do attitude, not just by saying words, but actually by doing what I say I will do.  Leadership by example.   Every new foundation is not without some form of risks, however we keep risk to a minimum by looking beyond the box and by using foresight and envision, we can eliminate the risk by keeping abreast to situations looking forward and seeing what is coming down the pike, to minimize the risk and cut them off before they become a problem.  Every business, organization or foundation has risk, but if you remain focused, determined have a good business plan with a sense of direction, you can achieve goals and milestones,  you minimize the risk factor, we learn from our mistakes and move forward, always striving to be better, more resourceful, and always striving to be the best we can be, because it's a direct reflection on us, as well as our Veterans in which we serve. Music 4 Vets Nederland again needs your help, not only financially but also through advertisement, and word of mouth. We need exposure to the communities that this foundation is in operation and is looking to expand, and create more veterans music groups. 

    Don't throw it away, Give it to a Veteran!!!

We are also looking for donations in second hand music equipment, and instruments,  that are just laying around the house and not being used anymore.  It goes from your hands to ours, directly into the hands of a veteran in need.  All contributions are considered un restricted gifts and can't be specified for any particular purposes.  I would like to personally thank you for your generosity and kindness in this insinuative, and for the Veteran in need, it's a life line to a better fulfilled life, one that a Veteran can be proud of.

Sarge's Para                                                                                                                 A Music 4 Vets CD avalable upon studio completion.  Music 4 Vets Nederland Patch... A autographed copy of Roy Kolmers Book.A personel autographed book by Marco Kroon, Knight of the military William Order recipient.  Comparable to the USA's Medal of Honor.Donald William Tate, Australian  Vietnam wounded war Veteran, joins forces with Music 4 Vets Nederland.  We have to offer two signed books, from the author. Both books are fantasic reading, and should complimate anyones collection of military knowledge, Donald Tate is a decotated war hero, and these books are a must for any military buff. Paul Woodadge (Author) The story of two 101st Airborne Screaming Eagle Medics on D-Day, June 6th, 1944. In Angoville-au-Plain, a small village between Utah Beach and Carentan, two medics treated over eighty casualties - American, German and French inside a 12th Century church. The book covers these events and also the history of the village throughout WWII.Pat Kelly - Irish born singer, songwriter & guitarist,  "Alice Is Not In Wonderland" featuring 10 new songs recorded in New York and Copenhagen, was released worldwide in February 2011. Pat Kelly  "Through the looking glass"  A weekend get away for two at the Willow Springs Way Station, willowsprings B&B along with a horse back riding tour, and a tour of Bastone from a well Known tour guide from the local area, Ronald Stassen.relivehistory      An Ibenez electric guitarA fabulous weekend getaway for 2 people, including dinner for 2 people, at the Eurotel, Atals Hotel in scenic valkenburg, Atlashotel along with a WWII guided tour from local tour guide Ronald Stassen to US Cemetery Margraten, and the Maastricht area. http://www.relivehistory44-45.com  Tickets to the valkenburg castle, And tikets to the Valkenburg caves. 
Plus a gift voucher to Thermae  2000 in Valkenburg. Thermae


And many more perks just choose the one that suits you best!!!As a NCO in the Marines, I learned the tools and the capabilities of good, sound leadership. I gain the trust of individuals, and instill in them a sense of self worth and give them that can do attitude, not just by saying words, but actually by doing what I say I will do.  Leadership by example.   Every new foundation is not without some form of risks, however we keep risk to a minimum by looking beyond the box and by using foresight and envision, we can eliminate the risk by keeping abreast to situations looking forward and seeing what is coming down the pike, to minimize the risk and cut them off before they become a problem.  Every business, organization or foundation has risk, but if you remain focused, determined have a good business plan with a sense of direction, you can achieve goals and milestones,  you minimize the risk factor, we learn from our mistakes and move forward, always striving to be better, more resourceful, and always striving to be the best we can be, because it's a direct reflection on us, as well as our Veterans in which we serve. Music 4 Vets Nederland again needs your help, not only financially but also through advertisement, and word of mouth. We need exposure to the communities that this foundation is in operation and is looking to expand, and create more veterans music groups.      Don't throw it away, Give it to a Veteran!!!We are also looking for donations in second hand music equipment, and instruments,  that are just laying around the house and not being used anymore.  It goes from your hands to ours, directly into the hands of a veteran in need.  All contributions are considered un restricted gifts and can't be specified for any particular purposes.  I would like to personally thank you for your generosity and kindness in this insinuative, and for the Veteran in need, it's a life line to a better fulfilled life, one that a Veteran can be proud of.

story:
Our Story

"U BETTER Sing!" is a unique educational web series that is the first of its kind to teach music literacy, basic music theory, music history/ethnomusicology, career options in the arts, music and its relationship to science, math, history, language arts, and social skills, and world cultures to its target audience of children ages 8 to 14 to create a unique and inspired life! 

 

I came up with the idea for this show when I was teaching middle school choir in Round Rock, TX.  I pitched the idea of the show to Austin's local PBS affiliate, KLRU 3 years ago.  They loved the idea and told me to create the pilot.  After seeing the pilot episode of U BETTER Sing!, they agreed it would make an excellent web series and even a possible TV series, but now, it is up to me and my board to come up with funding for the show's production in order to get past the pilot episode.

 

 

The Impact

Right now, the world is at a turning point.  The world's economy, the traditional educational systems are STRUGGLING because we are still basing our values on the mentality of the industrial revolution.  We are taught to believe that to be TRULY successful and respected, one must get a college degree in a respectable, core subject so that you can get a STABLE job to work for someone else... work and work until you're 65 to earn retirement, and THEN have fun by doing what you WANT to do....IF you're not to worn out to enjoy your sunset years.  Youth today are seeing giant corporations fall, and seeing their who gave up on their dreams  to WORK in the "REAL WORLD"  to make ends meet. HANDS ON LEARNING through EXPERIENCING the world through our SENSES makes learning STICK!  Do you remember School House Rock?! I remember so much of English grammar and math, and HISTORY through the songs we learned.  It expanded my mind, my vocabulary, and instilled the importance of joy while learning and growing!   We NEED show's like U BETTER Sing! to encourage young people to create a unique and INSPIRED life that stimulates their minds, their hearts, and eventually, and naturally, as a RESULT of following their PASSIONS and getting an solid education in areas where they excel, their bank accounts will FLOURISH as either an employer or as an employee! 

What We Need & What You Get

 

The STAR of U BETTER Sing! music literacy show is the show's cartoon, " U BETTER Sight Sing!" This first of its kind cartoon teaches a few things: 

1.How to audiate (how to hear music in your mind...like hearing words in your mind as you silently read words on a page of a book) in order to "SIGHT SING" music (the ability to pick up a piece of music, look at it, and hear the music in your mind, and then, SING it aloud...like reading the words off page of a book aloud!)

2. Teaches its audience how to deal with issues like bullying, how to cooperate, collaborate, and create with people who are "different" from you---people who may be out of your "comfort zone!" i.e. A different race, differently abled, different socioeconomic group, different culture, etc. The other segments of the show will be funded in other ways.  Here is the breakdown of production costs for the cartoon: U BETTER Sight-Sing! which you can see in this site:

Sound Engineer: 

$250.00 for one half day session 

1. Session One: Recording of voice over actors

2.  Session Two: Recording of instrumental accompaniment, sound effects, vocalists

3.  Session Three:  Editing of actors and music, sound effects

Total: $ 750 per episode

Total for 2 episodes: $1,500                                         :

 

 

Storyboard artist for U BETTER Sight Sing! at 4 hours per webisode

$25.00 an hour

$100.00 per webisode

Total:  $100.00 for 1 episode

Total for 2 episodes:  $200.00

 

 Flash Animation for 8 minute cartoon at 20 hours per webisode

Animators: $35.00 an hour

$700 per episode per animator

 $2,100 for 3 animators per webisode

Total: $2,100 per episode using 3 animators

Total for 2 episodes: $4,200.00

Director of Animation: $50.00 an hour for director of animation at 24 hours per webisode

Total:  $1,200 per episode

Total: $2,400 for 2 animations for one director of animation

Total for 2 episodes: $6,600

 
      Voice overs for, U BETTER Sight Sing! cartoon

Actors: $80.00 per episode averaging 8 characters per episode

$640 per webisode

Total:  $1,280 for 2 webisodes

 

Total for 1 ANIMATED SEGMENT:$4,790

      Total for 2 ANIMATED SEGMENTS: $9,580


Other Ways You Can Help

(Unleash the DIWO! -- 'Do It With Others' by asking folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign. Don't forget to remind them about the share tools!)

story:
Child of a Bellydancer & a Candlestick Maker, The Ukulady was born in an electric storm!

Armed with her  ukulele, craft supplies & puppet friends, including her pet, The UniCorndog, The Ukulady campaigns for The Downfall of Evil via songs & videos about Rainbow Valentines, Fire Tornados, Pushpin Owls & more!

Promoting kindness, intellectualism, creativity & fearlessness & friendship, Thessaly Lerner, The Ukulady, has opened for Dr. Demento & The Sippy Cups, played The Fillmore, been seen in the NY Times & heard on NPR & The Today Show and more!  The Ukulady has written hundreds of songs kids, humans, robots, puppets & woodland creatures of all ages want to hear! 

The Ukulady is dedicated to creating awesome music that kids, parents & even sullenly-cool teens love! At the exact same time as campaigning for The Downfall of Evil!

To The Downfall of Evil!  Music for Kids, Humans & Robots of All Ages!

The Ukulady needs $4200 for: 

Recording studio time, producer, engineer, mixing, mastering:  $1700

Artwork & graphics of album, including illustrated booklet accompanying album : $700 

Album duplication & distribution:  $1800.00. 


Donors receive Free Digital Downloads, Free Albums with Booklet, Handmade Ukulady crafts, Custom Theme Songs & Jingles, Custom Theme Song with Video, The Ukulady live in concert, The Ukulady hosting Craft Night with you and your friends!  


Other Ways You Can Help

How do you find out about the Most Delicious Pancakery?  The Shortest Shortcut?  The Best Slacksuit For Outfit-Parades?  Friendsies!  Word of Mouth!  Pass-it-On!  Please tell your friends, family, frenemies, business partners, corporate muckity-mucks, world leaders, meglamaniacs & the universe!   The more you share the campaign To The Downfall of Evil!  The quicker, the world becomes truly, a better place for kids & humans to live in.

story:
Saludos Desde La Bahia,  Hello to everyone from the San Francisco Bay Area!

We are the musical group "Las Almas" and music is how we discover the simple joys in life, as well as how we reveal deeper aspects of the self.  We love writing original music, but also enjoy playing classical traditional music from our Mexican heritage and that of other latino cultures.  We are currently organizing with other musical groups to perform in a concert dedicated to celebrating International Women's Day on March 8th of 2015.  This community concert will occur alongside thousands of events that will take place world-wide to recognize, encourage, and advocate for women's rights in all walks of life.

 The all female performance will feature original music and dance by members of the cast as well as renditions of songs composed by other women from Latin America and the Caribbean.  We are especially aware of the difficulty women in the arts face when attempting to create, produce, and participate as musicians.  We face discrimination, sexual harassment and are often objectified as a marketable objects. Respect and recognition for the basic dignity of our music and art is hard to come by.   We are therefore using this event to create awareness about this and to lend inspiration for all female artists to continue our work which enriches our community as a whole.   


With close to 20 musicians and dancers participating, we are aiming to raise 3,000 dollars in order to supplement our costs to pay the artists, organize, rehearse, and promote this event.  With your contribution, you will be directly creating opportunities for female artists to perform both original and seldom-heard works by women composers and to celebrate the essential role of women in music for the benefit of generations to come.  Even if you are not able to contribute monetarily, you can still contribute by spreading this message to your email lists and other social media.  We truly appreciate any support you can lend us.  Gracias y que viva la mujer!

story:
Short Summary

After 4 years of touring Texas and releasing the Ojos Azules - EP, Son de Rey is ready to start a new chapter in their musical journey with the release of their first full length album.

  • Nominated for 3 Austin Music Awards, recording with Grammy Winner Fabian Hernandez on new album, writing new music, and working on album marketing campaign.
  • Let's get our music heard on the radio and in your hands! 
  • When you make a donation, you're eligible for rewards and special prizes. Plus it goes to show how awesome you are. 

What We Need & What You Get

Here is why we need your support:

  • This is our first of several fundraisers for the album. We need a total of $2500 raised in this campaign that will go towards recording costs, CD manufacturing, and promotional purposes.
  • We have different levels of donations. You're eligible for free posters, CDs, T-shirts, and even a private show!
  • If we don't reach out entire goals, the funds will go towards recording 1 new single. 

The Impact

With your support, we'll be able to advance this musical project and continue to grow our business while making all our fans happy. 

  • Have you every wanted a copy of a Son de Rey CD?
  • Wouldn't it be awesome to help us get out outside of Texas, or even win a Grammy?
  • We've heard your demands, and we want to give back to you with more music and merchandise.

Risks & Challenges

Nothing comes easy. We know how difficult it is to get a project up and running.

  • We'll be releasing 1-2 videos a week to help get the word out.
  • We're even going to be doing special giveaways along the way to help spread the word. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that it can be hard for some to contribute, but here's how you can still help out:

  • Ask friends to get the word out, tell them who we are, and make some noise about Son de Rey.
  • Share this on Social Media, ask us to come speak at your community events, schools, churches, or invite us on your radio/TV show for an interview.

That's how you can help take this campaign to the next level!

story:
Our Story

INCLINATION’s Mission is to be the foremost online resource for Indie Music and Entertainment. We have a team of dedicated, passionate writers and contributors that are knowledgeable in their field and deliver results that are accurate, informative and entertaining. INCLINATION is for the artist and our aim is to highlight talent and positively impact growth and exposure in their field. It’s also for the fans and enthusiasts and through multiple media, provide a magazine to suit every inclination.


The Impact

Lissy and Cola need to raise funds to keep the dream alive.  With the economy suffering the way that it has been, our ad sales are exponentially down this term.  In order for us to renew our website and continue to pay for premium services on Webs, Issuu.com and Blogtalkradio, we need to raise some dollars. Without this money we will not be able to continue supporting all the great bands that we have been privileged to do so at www.inclinationonline.com or interview the killer guests on our primetime blogtalkradio show over at www.blogtalkradio.com/Inclination 


What We Need & What You Get

We have posted a monetary goal of $5000 by default, but are happy to make use of any generosity that our wonderful fans are willing to put forth.  Any donor will receive credit on our website for doing so, and if you are a business owner we will be willing to swap ad space or negotiate something of the like.  Special donors will receive autographed pictures of Lissy and Cola's legs.  


Other Ways You Can Help

We always appreciate feedback and music submissions, as well as freelance writers who would like to join our team and continue to support music and the arts.
